data: Erlach Court,—a vine-wreathed castle, not very imposing, on the Save,—a pleasant dining-room, with wide-open windows through which thousands of golden stars are seen twinkling in the dark blue of a July sky, while the air is laden with the fragrance of acacia- and linden-blossoms.

Erlach Court,--a vine-wreathed castle, not very imposing, on the Save,--a pleasant dining-room, with wide-open windows through which thousands of golden stars are seen twinkling in the dark blue of a July sky, while the air is laden with the fragrance of acacia- and linden-blossoms.
Schubin, Ossip, 1854-1934; Wister, A. L. (Annis Lee), 1830-1908 [Translator]
